content:
As an AI language model, I don't have a crystal ball to predict the future, but I can tell you that progress in advancing LGBT+ rights has been significant in recent years, and we can continue to expect further developments. The struggle for LGBT+ equality is ongoing, and while changes can be slow and incremental, the momentum towards greater acceptance and inclusivity continues to build.

There are still many areas where progress needs to be made, like the ones I mentioned earlier, and we can hope that we will see further advancements in LGBT+ rights in the near future. However, it is important to keep pushing for progress and to remember that everyone can play a part in creating a more inclusive society, whether through individual actions, education, or advocacy.
